attributes.action: Ensure that members of the new expenses committee are elected and not appointed from the great and good (otherwise known as"the Old Boys Club"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having listened to the debate today in Paliament, It would appear that the proposed new members expenses committee is to be made up of ex public school boys, ex MPs , ex Judges, Ex lawyers and Ex accountants . Where are the ordinary members of the public, who should be filling these places in an elected capacity ?. 
We, the public can have no faith in what is "just another quango" filled with the same faces as found on other  high paying committees.
